description.value:
School divination; Level psychic 7, sorcerer/wizard 7, witch 7;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S

Range personal
Targets you
Duration 1 min./level

Description

This spell functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.2dc7e9wby8qpi6m0]{arcane sight}, except that you automatically know which spells or magical effects are active upon any individual or object you see.

Unlike arcane sight, this spell cannot be made permanent with a @Compendium[pf1.spells.nsxngq65mbrzgwnm]{permanency} spell.
